name: loaf cat
notes:
make your very own squishy and adorable loaf cat amigurumi with this no-sew crochet pattern – perfect for beginners, fast makers, and craft fair sellers! no sewing is required — simply crochet in the round, stuff, add safety eyes, and you’re done!

this pattern includes:

- easy-to-follow written instructions
- full step-by-step video tutorial
- materials list (super bulky chenille yarn, safety eyes, polyfill, 4.5mm hook)
- tips for customization

you’ll love how quickly it works up and how well it sells at markets!


 skill level: beginner
 file format: pdf
 great for: craft fairs, gifts, stress-free makes!

***size***
2.5 (w) x 4.5 (h) inches 

***skill*** 
advanced beginner 


***this pattern uses us crochet terms***


ready to crochet your own no-sew cat? 
download the pdf pattern or view it for free (not printable) on my website and start crocheting today!

the pattern can be purchased here as an ad-free printer-friendly pdf.

> this pattern can also be found in my
> crochet membership "the crochet club" which includes over
> 500 patterns, and 100s of video
> tutorials. more info about the membership is
> [here][1].

***you can also get this pattern in a no-sew amigurumi ebook with 30 crochet patterns and 15+ video tutorials and tips [right here][2].***
